org.cougaar.core.servlet
Class SimpleServletComponent

java.lang.Object
  org.cougaar.util.GenericStateModelAdapter
      org.cougaar.core.servlet.BaseServletComponent
          org.cougaar.core.servlet.SimpleServletComponent
All Implemented Interfaces:
Component, GenericStateModel
Direct Known Subclasses:
BlackboardServletComponent
public class SimpleServletComponent
extends BaseServletComponent

Component that loads a Servlet and provides the SimpleServletSupport.

Usage in an ".ini" file is:

   ...
   plugin = <this-class>(<servlet-class>, <path>)
   ...

where
   <this-class>
      is "org.cougaar.core.servlet.SimpleServletComponent"
   <servlet-class>
      is the class name of a Servlet.
      The servlet must have a zero-argument constructor.
      If the Servlet has a
        public void setSimpleServletSupport(SimpleServletSupport support)
      method then a SimpleServletSupport is passed, which provides
      limited access to Cougaar internals.
   <path>
      is the path for the Servlet, such as "/test".

Most of this code is "reflection-glue" to:

  • capture the (classname, path) parameters
  • construct the class instance
  • examine the class's method(s)
  • setup and create a SimpleServletSupportImpl instance
Most subclass developers have the classname and path hard-coded, so they should consider not extending SimpleServletComponent and instead use BaseServletComponent. The additional benefit is that subclasses of BaseServletComponent have full access to the ServiceBroker.

See Also:
SimpleServletSupport

setParameter

public void setParameter(java.lang.Object o)
Save our Servlet's configurable path, for example "/test".

This is only set during initialization and is constant for the lifetime of the Servlet.

Overrides:

createServlet

protected javax.servlet.Servlet createServlet()
Description copied from class: BaseServletComponent
Create the Servlet instance.

This is done within "load()", and is also a good time to aquire additional services from the "serviceBroker" (for example, BlackboardService).

Specified by:
createServlet in class BaseServletComponent
